title: Video: Team Qhubeka ASSOS releases ‘Race for Change’ Episode 1
content:
“Qhubeka, the name itself, is very unique. It means moving on. It’s different to all other teams because it’s a team that races for a greater purpose,” says rider Nic Dlamini. “It’s a phenomenal feeling to ride for a South African team that’s registered in South Africa, not in Europe. It adds value, to us, to the team, and to the followers.”

This first episode of the team’s Race for Change series introduces some of the riders and shows how the team’s purpose drives their own athletic goals.

The post Video: Team Qhubeka ASSOS releases ‘Race for Change’ Episode 1 appeared first on CyclingTips.
author: Abby Mickey
